CustomField.formula: IF( TEXT(SBQQ__PricingMethod__c) = "Cost", SBQQ__UnitCost__c * SBQQ__Quantity__c * CASE(Trans_Category__c, "Sub Rental", Sublease_Multiplier__c, "Sale", IF( SBQQ__Bundled__c = FALSE, 1, 0) , "Rental", 0 , "Rental Cost", 0, 1), IF( OR(AND(Trans_Category__c = "Upfronts", Shell__c ), Required_By_Product_Price_Rule__c = 'A La Carte Operations', Required_By_Product_Price_Rule__c = 'Install 2.0'), SBQQ__UnitCost__c * SBQQ__Quantity__c ,0) )
CustomField.label: Total Non-Rental Cost
